## copy() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use \*\*Blockly.clipboard.copy\*\* instead.
> 

Copy a block or workspace comment onto the local clipboard.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function copy(toCopy: ICopyable): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toCopy | [ICopyable](./blockly.icopyable_interface.md) | Block or Workspace Comment to be copied. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
